text:
cloning a CM between portal doesn't work properly if you have a JS library dependency.
It will copy the JS file, but inside the CM the linked file is to the other portal (so broken link). I had to manually update the dependency (remove the old one and attach the new one) so the CM can work properly
Are you using  `{% import %}` in the linked JS file?
nope, the JS was attached to the CM following the recomendations for CM v2

DM is still pretty slow today :slightly_frowning_face: 
If I try to click inside the code editor for editing a module, it takes 3 seconds for the blinking cursor to appear. Same with any keystroke of a keyboard. etc
^ started having this issue in the past 15 or so minutes. publishing and clicking into the editor panes are especially slow

<@U22PNRAJD> some of our modules are being blocked from adding to a template because of the “Make this module available for templates” message discussed yesterday - if we have not signed up for the toggle, how are we supposed to make these modules available?
Slow DM is killing me today.
A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
not exactly increasing my productivity for the day... lol
